description:
Welcome to College Algebra!

This course provides some previously asked midterm questions and detailed solutions for College Algebra second midterm exam. The topics include line equations, inequalities, difference quotient, domain and range of a function, piecewise functions, composition of functions, graphs and transformation of graphs.

The questions covered will be a good resource for College Algebra students who are preparing for their second midterm. Each video focuses on a type of problem and provides several tips and steps to solve it.

The videos can be completed in less than an hour and they should give you an idea about the type of problems that you can encounter in your exams.

Your feedback is quite valuable to me. Please tell me if you get stuck somewhere and I will improve the videos or provide more questions. I want to make sure you all ace your exams!
title: College Algebra - Second Midterm
